## Checklist

- [ ] `cargo fmt` and `cargo clippy` pass
- [ ] `cargo test` passes
- [ ] Frontend builds without errors
- [ ] Changes are documented if needed

## Release

Add a label to control the version bump on merge:
- `major` — breaking changes
- `minor` — new features
- _(no label)_ — patch (default)
